document.heading: Wastewater System Regulation Amendment Act of 1985

history.narrative: Law 6-95, the “Wastewater System Regulation Amendment Act of 1985,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 6-189, which was referred to the Committee on Public Works. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 3, 1985, and December 17, 1985, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 15, 1986, it was assigned Act No. 6-124 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
